statements: UPDATE Inventory SET price = 15.99, quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET item_name = 'New Item', price = 24.50 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 10, price = 25.50 WHERE item_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE Inventory SET price = 19.99, quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20, price = 15.99 WHERE item_id = 100;
UPDATE SalesData SET quantity_sold = 50, total_sales = 750.25, sale_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE sale_id = 500;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100, price = 25.50 WHERE item_id = 123;
UPDATE SalesData SET quantity_sold = 50, total_sales = 1500.75, sale_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE sale_id = 456;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE CustomerReviews SET review_text = 'Great product, highly recommended!' WHERE review_id = 201;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_id = 123;
UPDATE SalesData SET total_sales = total_sales + 50.25 WHERE order_id = 456;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_reviews SET rating = 4, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET unit_price = 49.99, quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE sales_data SET total_price = total_price * 1.1, quantity_sold = quantity_sold - 2 WHERE sale_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET total_amount = 500.00, quantity_sold = 50 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, price = 25.99 WHERE item_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 98765;
